div.head: 五心煩躁
div.div: vexing agitation in the five centers

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: vexing agitation in the five centers

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with wu xin fan re 五心煩熱 , vexing heat in the five centers. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bie 鱉 quotes Quan you xin jian 全幼心鑒 : 小兒疳勞：治潮熱往來，五心煩躁，盜汗咳 嗽，用鱉血丸主之 , “Children with gan-illness exhaustion: To cure tidal heat waves that come and go, vexing agitation in the five centers , and robber sweat with cough, use the pills with soft turtle blood to control this”.
